metadata.title: Status-Only PRD Test Fixture
metadata.summary: Tests PRD format with status field but no passes field.

items.title: Pending Task Test
items.description: As a tester, I want a task with status pending so that it becomes passes: false.

items.title: Done Task Test
items.description: As a tester, I want a task with status done so that it becomes passes: true.

items.title: Actionable Task Test
items.description: As a tester, I want a task with status actionable so that it becomes passes: false.
